review_title: Fantastic organisation to work for with excellent staff support
pros: Excellent values Supportive team Very approachable and friendly CEO Good benefits
cons: Pay has been reviewed recently and so now reflects our competitor's salary but this was lower previously. Much better now and staff feel as though their comments have been listened to.

job_title: Customer Service Advisor in Preston, North West England, England
pros: The team was good, supportive, the work we do helps vulnerable people
cons: After the previous manager went on mat leave, the interim manager was the polar opposite. No support, especially to someone who had disclosed major health issues.

pros: Some fantastic managers and a lot of strong team relationships in some areas.
cons: For a small charity there are now an awful lot of tiers which has resulted in a vast difference between the front line workers and senior management.

pros: Great place to work if you want help people who can not help themselves
